actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Channel Islands Marine National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish and maintain in the State of California the Channel Islands Marine National Park. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Channel Islands Marine National Park, and for other purposes.
